text: Fortunato Natale Perri Jr. is an attorney for the firm of McMonagle, Perri & McHugh, located in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. Perri is notable for being the defense attorney representing hip hop artists Beanie Sigel"Beanie Sigel's Re- Trial for Attempted Murder Begins." SFGate.com and Cassidy. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Pennsylvania lawyers Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Fortunato N. Perri Jr.
